title: Microsoft Corp. stock falls Monday, underperforms market
text:
Shares of Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.15%
       slipped 0.54% to $396.51 Monday, on what proved to be an all-around favorable trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        -0.14%
       rising 0.22% to 4,850.43 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        -0.77%
       rising 0.36% to 38,001.81. The stock's fall snapped a two-day winning streak. Microsoft Corp. closed $2.16 below its 52-week high ($398.67), which the company reached on January 19th. The stock underperformed when compared to some of its competitors Monday, as Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        +0.53%
       rose 1.22% to $193.89, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +2.04%
       fell 0.18% to $147.71, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +2.15%
       fell 0.27% to $145.99. Trading volume (24.3 M) remained 1.6 million below its 50-day average volume of 26.0 M.
